mapper.insert:
select board_seq.nextval from dual
insert into board (num, title, content, pass, name, fName) values (#{num}, #{title}, #{content}, #{pass}, #{name}, #{fName})
mapper.select:
select num, title, name from board where 1=0
or title like ('%${title}%')
or content like ('%${content}%')
or name like ('%${name}%')
or 1=1
order by num desc
